newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks fall on weak futures.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks fall on weak futures.

text.p: Tokyo stocks were led lower by weakness in future contracts in early Friday morning trade, brokers said. They said the weakness was brought on by Nikkei 225 future contracts in Chicago which ended with hefty losses overnight.
As of 0016 GMT, the Nikkei 225 was down 169.30 points or 0.93 percent at 17,975.04. Its March futures were 130 points down at 17,990.
"Losses should be limited as domestic institutional investors, including pension funds, should buy lower down," a broker at a "Big Four" brokerage said.
